from Crypto.Util.number import bytes_to_long
from secert import flag,q,p
import random

m = bytes_to_long(flag)

n = p*q

g = n+1

r = random.randint(1,n)

c=(pow(g,m,n*n)*pow(r,n,n*n))%(n*n)

print "c={}".format(c)
print "n={}".format(n)
